description: This file is an HTML webpage implementing a GUI for visualizing database contents, including JavaScript code for fetching databases, tables, and data, and rendering interactive tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases.

methods.name: reloadDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching data and updating the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show/hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a specific table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data as an interactive HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a table cell, handling different data types and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object-like data.
